name: Cheddar, Herb & Garlic Biscuits
description: Warm, homemade biscuits add a comforting touch to any family dinner.

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or salt

preparation: Mix together flour, baking powder, dip mix and salt.
Using a pastry blender, combine butter with dry mixture until pieces are the size of small peas. Stir in cheddar. Add milk and stir to fully incorporate.
Turn dough out onto a clean, floured surface and gently knead 6 – 8 times. Pat dough out to a thickness of approximately 1⁄2” and cut to desired shape.
Place biscuits onto Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and bake for 15 minutes, or until lightly browned.
